concepts.name: CareMate - Family Health Companion
concepts.description: Family-Centered Digital Health Platform for Elderly Care

documentation.overview: Family Health Companion is a mobile-first healthcare web application designed to help elderly parents in India manage their daily medicines, understand basic health information, and stay connected with their families and trusted doctors. The platform bridges the emotional and practical gap between elders and migrated family members.
documentation.problem: India has over 140 million people aged 60+, suffering from chronic conditions. Issues include forgetting medicines, dosage confusion, and emotional isolation. Migrated children lack reliable ways to monitor parents' health.
documentation.vision: To create a calm, trustworthy, family-first health companion that helps elders live safely and helps families stay emotionally connected.
features: Home Dashboard: Friendly greeting, medicine reminders, quick actions
Medicine Management: Manual/Scan entry, dosage, timing
Smart Reminders: Push/WhatsApp/SMS notifications to family on missed dose
Family Circle: Role-based access for Son, Daughter, Caregiver
AI Health Assistant (Safe Mode): Explains symptoms, never diagnoses
Emergency Safety: Detects critical keywords, emergency warnings

concepts.name: GenCorp - Creator Talent Intelligence
concepts.description: Where creators are hired for skill, not followers.

documentation.overview: A professional network and hiring system for the creator economy. It replaces vanity metrics (followers) with a Creator Performance Index (CPI) and connects creators with brands based on skill, trust, and ROI.
documentation.problem: Creators are invisible despite skill; no professional identity. Brands face fake followers and no ROI tracking. Existing platforms focus on popularity, not performance.
documentation.vision: Create the global professional system for creator talent.
features: Creator Performance Index (CPI): Engagement, Quality, ROI, Trust
Creator Identity Engine: Portfolio, Skills, Work Gallery
Brand Discovery Engine: Skill + ROI filters
Feedback Engine: Content reviews, improvement tracking

concepts.name: TrainConnect - Smart Railway System
concepts.description: Smart Passenger Networking & Support System for Indian Railways

documentation.overview: TrainConnect creates a real-time digital ecosystem inside each train using PNR-based secure login, coach-wise communication groups, and structured service requests.
documentation.problem: Indian Railways communication is unstructured, unsafe, and inefficient. There is no digital layer inside a moving train.
documentation.vision: To turn every train into a connected, trackable service environment.
features: PNR Login: Auto-fetch train, coach, seat
